addonManifest.name: PostgreSQL
addonManifest.description: Provides PostgreSQL databases scoped to a development team.
addonManifest.deploymentNotes: This add-on assumes that you already have a PostgreSQL instnace running, configured with authentication, and one admin user. The admin username and password are needed to create client databases.
addonManifest.author: P. van Dorp

property.description: The server name of a PostgreSQL instance.
The server port of a PostgreSQL instance.
The username of a PostgreSQL administrator.
The password of a PostgreSQL administrator.
